definitions.definition: To (gently) tap the flat of one's hand on a person or thing.
examples: To show affection, he decided he would pat the boy on the head.

definitions.definition: To hit lightly and repeatedly with the flat of the hand to make smooth or flat
examples: I patted the cookie dough into shape.

definitions.definition: To stroke or fondle (an animal). Compare pet .
examples: Do you want to pat the cat?
definitions.label_groups: UK , Australia , New Zealand , South Africa

main_definition: To (gently) tap the flat of one's hand on a person or thing.
secondary_definitions: To hit lightly and repeatedly with the flat of the hand to make smooth or flat
( UK , Australia , New Zealand , South Africa ) To stroke or fondle (an animal). Compare pet .
